DOC.brief_summary: Use versus non use urinary catheterization Second Elective caesarean delivery :
DOC.brief_title: Catheterization During Second Elective Caesarean Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation OF use versus non use urinary catheterization Second Elective caesarean delivery : urine analysis 24 hour postoperative exclude urinary tract infection .
DOC.criteria: inclusion criterion pregnant female undergo second elective caesarean section full term pregnancy ( 38:41 week gestational age ) . Women history one previous caesarean Section . Women history tonic postpartum hemorrhage . Women Urinary tract infection present pregnancy . Women diabetes mellitus present pregnancy . Women medical disorder present pregnancy obligate monitoring urine output caesarean section , severe preeclampsia renal disease pregnancy . Emergency caesarean section
